    "# Customer Churn Prediction\n",
    "\n",
    "This project predicts whether a telecom customer will churn using machine learning. We trained and evaluated several models including Logistic Regression and Random Forest.\n",
    "\n",
    "## Dataset\n",
    "Telco Customer Churn Dataset (from Kaggle)\n",
    "\n",
    "## Models Used\n",
    "- Logistic Regression\n",
    "- Random Forest\n",
    "- Decision Tree\n",
    "\n",
    "## Accuracy\n",
    "Random Forest achieved ~81% accuracy on test data.\n",
    "\n",
    "## How to Run\n",
    "Open the notebook in Jupyter or Google Colab to explore the model.\n"
   ]
